response.overview: When a nameless amnesiac wakes up in a bunker, they're immediately thrust into the trenches of an endless war. Created in Blender EEVEE. Special thank you to the Kickstarter and Patreon supporters who made this possible. ERSATZ was solo-animated over the course of one and a half years by Saint Greaver @saintsart on YouTube. Then brought to life by an immensely talented audio team: Voice actors: Mophead - Danny Spiller Munroe - Patrick Langner Carrie - Luke Alphonso Warwick - lan Russell The Nurse and the Lieutenant - Nola Klop The Ascetic and additional voices - GM Hakim Music: SH1KHAR | @sh1khar_music Maichol Bondanelli | @maicholbondanelli Sound design & mixing: Sol√®ne Falk (Archifulk) The Mars Worm Knyght Dubs: Ukrainian - Soloway Studio Latin American Spanish - SKVox Studio Thai - Maina Studio Vietnamese - Vagabond Studio
response.title: ERSATZ | PILOT
